trans-unit.source: To install an update from the Azure portal
trans-unit.target: To install an update from the Azure portal

trans-unit.source: On the StorSimple service page, select your device.
trans-unit.target: On the StorSimple service page, select your device.

trans-unit.source: Navigate to **Devices** > **Maintenance**.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to **Devices** > **Maintenance**.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the page, click **Scan Updates**.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the page, click **Scan Updates**.

trans-unit.source: A job will be created to scan for available updates.
trans-unit.target: A job will be created to scan for available updates.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified when the job has completed successfully.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified when the job has completed successfully.

trans-unit.source: In the **Software Updates** section on the same page, you will see that new software updates are available.
trans-unit.target: In the **Software Updates** section on the same page, you will see that new software updates are available.

trans-unit.source: We recommend that you review the release notes before you apply an update on your device.
trans-unit.target: We recommend that you review the release notes before you apply an update on your device.

trans-unit.source: At the bottom of the page, click **Install Updates**, and then **OK**.
trans-unit.target: At the bottom of the page, click **Install Updates**, and then **OK**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Install updates** dialog box, make sure that you've followed the recommendations, then select **I understand the above requirement and am ready to upgrade my device** and click the check button.
trans-unit.target: In the **Install updates** dialog box, make sure that you've followed the recommendations, then select **I understand the above requirement and am ready to upgrade my device** and click the check button.

trans-unit.source: Confirmation message
trans-unit.target: Confirmation message

trans-unit.source: A set of prerequisite checks will now start.
trans-unit.target: A set of prerequisite checks will now start.

trans-unit.source: These include:
trans-unit.target: These include:

trans-unit.source: **Controller health checks** to verify that both the device controllers are healthy and online.
trans-unit.target: **Controller health checks** to verify that both the device controllers are healthy and online.

trans-unit.source: **Hardware component health checks** to verify that all the hardware components on your StorSimple device are healthy.
trans-unit.target: **Hardware component health checks** to verify that all the hardware components on your StorSimple device are healthy.

trans-unit.source: **DATA 0 checks** to verify that DATA 0 is enabled on your device.
trans-unit.target: **DATA 0 checks** to verify that DATA 0 is enabled on your device.

trans-unit.source: If this interface is not enabled, you will need to enable it and then retry.
trans-unit.target: If this interface is not enabled, you will need to enable it and then retry.

trans-unit.source: **DATA 2 and DATA 3 checks** to verify that DATA 2 and DATA 3 network interfaces are not enabled.
trans-unit.target: **DATA 2 and DATA 3 checks** to verify that DATA 2 and DATA 3 network interfaces are not enabled.

trans-unit.source: If these interfaces are enabled, then you will need to disable them and then try to update your device.
trans-unit.target: If these interfaces are enabled, then you will need to disable them and then try to update your device.

trans-unit.source: This check is performed only if you are updating from a device running GA software.
trans-unit.target: This check is performed only if you are updating from a device running GA software.

trans-unit.source: Devices running versions 0.1, 0.2, or 0.3 will not need this check.
trans-unit.target: Devices running versions 0.1, 0.2, or 0.3 will not need this check.

trans-unit.source: **Gateway check** on any device running a version prior to Update 1.
trans-unit.target: **Gateway check** on any device running a version prior to Update 1.

trans-unit.source: This check is performed on all the device running pre-update 1 software but fails on the devices that have a gateway configured for a network interface other than DATA 0.
trans-unit.target: This check is performed on all the device running pre-update 1 software but fails on the devices that have a gateway configured for a network interface other than DATA 0.

trans-unit.source: The update is applied if all checks are successfully completed.
trans-unit.target: The update is applied if all checks are successfully completed.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified that checks are in progress.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified that checks are in progress.

trans-unit.source: Pre-check notification
trans-unit.target: Pre-check notification

trans-unit.source: The following is an example in which the checks failed.
trans-unit.target: The following is an example in which the checks failed.

trans-unit.source: You will need to verify that both the device controllers are healthy and online.
trans-unit.target: You will need to verify that both the device controllers are healthy and online.

trans-unit.source: You will also need to check the health of the hardware components.
trans-unit.target: You will also need to check the health of the hardware components.

trans-unit.source: In this example, Controller 0 and Controller 1 components need attention.
trans-unit.target: In this example, Controller 0 and Controller 1 components need attention.

trans-unit.source: You may need to contact Microsoft Support if you cannot address these issues by yourself.
trans-unit.target: You may need to contact Microsoft Support if you cannot address these issues by yourself.

trans-unit.source: Checks failed
trans-unit.target: Checks failed

trans-unit.source: After the checks are successfully completed, an update job will be created.
trans-unit.target: After the checks are successfully completed, an update job will be created.

trans-unit.source: You will be notified when the update job is successfully created.
trans-unit.target: You will be notified when the update job is successfully created.

trans-unit.source: Update job creation
trans-unit.target: Update job creation

trans-unit.source: The update will then be applied on your device.
trans-unit.target: The update will then be applied on your device.

trans-unit.source: To monitor the progress of the update job, click **View Job**.
trans-unit.target: To monitor the progress of the update job, click **View Job**.

trans-unit.source: On the **Jobs** page, you can see the update progress.
trans-unit.target: On the **Jobs** page, you can see the update progress.

trans-unit.source: The update will take a few hours to complete.
trans-unit.target: The update will take a few hours to complete.

trans-unit.source: Select the update job and click **Details** to view the details of the job at any time.
trans-unit.target: Select the update job and click **Details** to view the details of the job at any time.

trans-unit.source: After the job is complete, navigate to the **Maintenance** page and scroll down to **Software Updates**.
trans-unit.target: After the job is complete, navigate to the **Maintenance** page and scroll down to **Software Updates**.
